name: Gorilla 100% Silicone Sealant All Purpose, 10 Ounce Cartridge, Clear (Pack of 1)
short_description: Indoor/Outdoor 100% Waterproof Seal – Provides a durable, long-lasting seal for both indoor and outdoor use, perfect for showers, sinks, windows, doors, gutters, and vents
30-Minute Water-Ready – Fast-curing formula allows water exposure in just 30 minutes, perfect for quick home repairs and DIY projects
Mold & Mildew Resistant – Protects surfaces from mold and mildew growth; easy to maintain with regular cleaning for lasting performance
Highly Flexible & Durable – Meets ASTM C-920, Class 35 standards; won’t shrink, crack, or break down over time
Clean Finish – Maintains a professional look without yellowing
product_description: Gorilla 100% Silicone Sealant is a versatile, 100% waterproof seal perfect for indoor and outdoor use on showers, sinks, windows, doors, gutters, vents, and more. Its 30-minute water-ready formula allows fast exposure to water, while fully curing in 24 hours for durable, long-lasting performance. Mold and mildew resistant, highly flexible, and meeting ASTM C-920, Class 35 standards, it won’t shrink, crack, or yellow over time, maintaining a clean, professional finish. Ideal for home repairs, DIY projects, and professional applications, it delivers a reliable, and multipurpose seal. DIRECTIONS: TO OPEN: Cut nozzle at 45° angle to desired bead size. Completely puncture inner foil seal. TO USE: All surfaces should be clean of dirt, grease, oil, and old sealant. For gaps larger than 1/2", use a backer rod. Best if applied above 40°F (5°C). 1. Insert into cartridge gun. 2. Apply sealant, pushing bead ahead of nozzle. 3. Smooth bead immediately after application, before a skin forms. CLEAN-UP: Wipe off wet sealant immediately with a dry cloth. Isopropyl alcohol may be used according to solvent manufacturer’s instructions. STORAGE: Store in cool, dry location with nozzle attached. To re-use product, remove nozzle and clean out cured sealant from the tip. MOLD & MILDEW RESISTANT: Cured sealant is resistant to mold. Cured sealant must be cleaned regularly with soap and water to prevent growth on top of the sealant. .
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #232 in Industrial & Scientific ( See Top 100 in Industrial & Scientific ) #1 in Industrial Joint Sealants

name: Red Devil 08160I RD PRO Industrial Grade RTV 100% Silicone Sealant, 10.1 oz, White, 1 Pack
short_description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE SEALANT: Ideal for maintenance and OEM applications, the 100% RTV silicone sealant is specially formulated for weather-resistant external window & door applications such as window and door frames, siding, baseboards, showers/bathtubs, gutters, plumbing fixtures, countertops/sinks, and loose tiles

EXCELLENT ADHESION TO VARIOUS SURFACES: This 100% Silicone Sealant can be used on a variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces and adheres to most metals, painted surfaces, plastics, ceramic tiles, rubbers, non-oily woods, porcelain, glass, marble, and fiberglass

WILL NOT CRACK, SHRINK OR PEEL: With its Superior Flexibility and Vibration Resistance, the multi-purpose sealant will withstand the elements and won't crack, peel or shrink for a dependable seal that lasts for years
LOW ODOR FORMULA: The advanced formula sealant is VOC compliant and boasts a low odor, and is USDA Recognized, and NSF listed. Made in the USA

FOR BEST RESULTS: Before applying the sealant, remove any old caulk, debris, or other residues that might interfere with adhesion and make sure the architectural grade RTV Sealant is used on clean, dry surfaces for best results
product_description: High Performance 100% Silicone sealing and glazing compound that is ideal for use in most OEM and maintenance applications. Use on Window/Door Frames, Siding, Baseboards, Showers/Tubs, Gutters, Plumbing Fixtures, Countertops/Sinks & Loose Tiles.

EXCELLENT ADHESION TO VARIOUS SURFACES: This 100% Silicone Sealant can be used on a variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces and adheres to most metals, painted surfaces, plastics, ceramic tiles, rubbers, non-oily woods, porcelain, glass, marble, and fiberglass. Made in the USA

WILL NOT CRACK, SHRINK OR PEEL: With its Superior Flexibility and Vibration Resistance, the multi-purpose sealant will withstand the elements and won't crack, peel or shrink for a dependable seal that lasts for years

product_description: Red Devil’s PRO Industrial Grade RTV 100% Silicone sealant is ideal for use in most OEM and maintenance applications. The Case Pack comes in a box of 12 10.1-ounce tubes for convenient storage and a perforated opening for easy access. The sealant forms a strong, durable, and weather-resistant seal and provides excellent adhesion to most non-porous surfaces. It offers excellent adhesion, flexibility, and impressive durability and can be used on a variety of surfaces indoors or outdoors. Use on window and door frames, siding, baseboards, showers/bathtubs, gutters, plumbing fixtures, countertops/sinks, loose tiles, or any other surface silicone adheres to. The multi-purpose sealant withstands the elements and won't crack, peel or shrink when applied correctly. For best application, remove any old caulk with a razor blade, as silicone doesn't adhere to itself or other sealants; clean and dry the surface before applying the sealant for a tight adhesion. Cut the nozzle/spout at a 45-degree angle for desired bead size. Please note that the silicone sealant is not paintable, so be sure to complete the painting of the surface prior to sealant application.

name: GE Advanced Silicone Caulk for Window & Door, Clear, 10 fl oz Cartridge, 1 Pack - 100% Waterproof Silicone Sealant, 5X Stronger Adhesion, Shrink & Crack Proof
short_description: 100% Waterproof and Weatherproof Silicone Caulk Protection: This silicone caulk clear provides ultimate waterproof and weatherproof protection for window and door, ensuring protection against water damage providing exception seal. Ideal for areas with consistent exposure, keeping your surfaces safeguarded and pristine under any weather condition.

Strong and Flexible: Delivers a silicone sealant waterproof clear that remains permanently flexible, adapting to surface movements for a lasting, durable hold. Perfect for dynamic environments like window and door where adaptability and resilience are paramount. 40% more flexibility than Class 25 sealants and 5X stronger adhesion than our Silicone 1 sealant.

Quick 30 Minute Rain Ready Performance: Experience the convenience of a silicone caulk that becomes water resistant in just 30 minutes, making it perfect for time sensitive projects. No more waiting hours, dependable, quick sealing efficiency with clear silicone caulk.

Shrink and Crack Proof: Experience superior durability with clear silicone caulk that withstands temperature fluctuations. Its flexibility guarantees your surfaces stay intact without shrinking or cracking, ensuring consistent protection and a flawless finish over time.

Low Odor and Safe Indoors: Enjoy stress free application with this silicone sealant featuring a low odor, neutral cure formula. Great for indoor use without overwhelming fumes, enhancing comfort and safety while ensuring effective waterproof clear protection for your spaces and 10 year product protection.
product_description: GE Advanced Silicone 2 Window and Door sealant is a high-performance, 100% silicone and 100% weatherproof sealant ideal for protecting areas susceptible to harsh weather. Ideal for exterior applications, the sealant is rain-ready in 30 minutes. Our sealant is 40% more flexible than Class 25 sealants and has 5X stronger adhesion than our Silicone 1 sealant. This sealant also has a low odor thanks to its neutral-cure formula, and it won’t discolor most high-end metal finishes such as chrome, bronze, and nickel. Use GE Advanced Silicone 2 Window and Door sealant on a variety of surfaces, including windows, doors, siding, trim, molding, baseboards, vents, basements, attics, and around wires and pipes.

product_description: Permatex Clear Silicone Adhesive Sealant is a General-Purpose, Clear RTV Indoor and Outdoor Sealant with a low odor formula. This all-purpose formula effectively bonds, repairs, seals, mends and secures glass, metal, plastics, fabric, vinyl, Silicone resin, Vulcanized silicone rubber, Ceramic, Natural and synthetic fibers, Painted surfaces weather stripping and vinyl tops. While also protecting and repairing electrical wiring and may be applied to horizontal or vertical surfaces. Permatex Clear Silicone Adhesive Sealant is Waterproof and Flexible with a Temperature Range -75° Fahrenheit To 400° Fahrenheit (-59°C To 204°C). This sealant is oil, water, weather, vibration, and grease resistant. Suggested applications include windshields, door frames, electrical connections, seams and roofs, vinyl tops, and windshields.
